description: Defines the Response class for handling JSON-RPC responses within WebSockets namespace, including methods to retrieve response ID, validate result/error, and access JSON payloads.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message, providing methods to access the response ID, determine if the response is a result or error, and retrieve the JSON payload.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the response message.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result JSON object if available.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error JSON object if available.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks whether the response message is valid.
